channel.title: TMC on alexdess.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in TMC on alexdess.cloud

item.title: TMC - Tanzu Mission Control
item.description: Consistent K8s security and operations across teams and Clouds In this Blogpost we will use a TKG Cluster deployed on VMware Cloud on AWS and integrate it with Tanzu Mission Control. We will make use of the Identity and Access Management, Compliance Policy Enigne and integrated Backup Capabilties of Tanzu Mission Control. The Tanzu Portfolio The VMware Tanzu portfolio is a set of products which has the goal to modernize your infrastructure and applications in order to deliver better software to production.
